name: HKCorrelation
desc: A sample that groups multiple related samples into a single entry.

items.name: init(type: HKCorrelationType, start: Date, end: Date, objects: Set<HKSample>)
items.desc: Instantiates and returns a new correlation instance.

items.name: init(type: HKCorrelationType, start: Date, end: Date, objects: Set<HKSample>, metadata: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Instantiates and returns a new correlation instance with the provided metadata.

items.name: init(type: HKCorrelationType, start: Date, end: Date, objects: Set<HKSample>, device: HKDevice?, metadata: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Instantiates and returns a new correlation instance with the provided device and metadata.

items.name: var objects: Set<HKSample>
items.desc: The set of sample objects that make up the correlation.

items.name: func objects(for: HKObjectType) -> Set<HKSample>
items.desc: Returns a set containing all the objects of the specified type in the correlation.
